com.github.dandelion.core.asset.processor

Interface AssetProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAssetProcessor, CssMinProcessor, CssUrlRewritingProcessor, JsMinProcessor

    public interface AssetProcessor

    SPI for all asset processors.

    Since:
    0.10.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getProcessorKey() 
      void process(Reader reader, Writer writer, ProcessingContext processingContext)
      Performs the processing of the Asset stored in the given ProcessingContext by reading its content from the given Reader and writing the new content to the Writer.

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessorKey

        String getProcessorKey()
        Returns:
        the processor key associated with the processor. The key is used in the in the Configuration to activate the corresponding processor.

      • process

        void process(Reader reader,
           Writer writer,
           ProcessingContext processingContext)
             throws DandelionException

        Performs the processing of the Asset stored in the given ProcessingContext by reading its content from the given Reader and writing the new content to the Writer.

        Parameters:
        reader - The reader containig the content to process.
        writer - The destination writer.
        processingContext - The processing context that includes the Asset to be processed.
        Throws:
        DandelionException - if something goes wrong during the processing of the asset.
